page.title: 04Stillingfleet (cont)
page.content: People living in the village have quite a few leisure activities available. The Woman's Institute meet monthly, also arranging outings,jumble sales, coffee mornings etc. There are Over Sixties, Toddlers, Cricket, and Horticultural clubs, and a Methodist Chapel Guild. China painting & crafts evening classes are held. { The two-hourly York-Selby bus serves {Stillingfleet, except on Sundays. Medically the inhabitants have to go to Eskrick for the doctor's surgery. They also have visits from district nurses and health visitors. A rota system is operated by car owners to take patients to surgery and hospital. Prescriptions are dispensed by doctors or from chemists in nearby towns. A mobile chiropody unit comes quarterly. The public house{The Cross Keys} serves beer, wine, etc.and bar meals.
